DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine whether Eustachian tube dilation conjunction medical management medical management alone effective treat Eustachian tube dysfunction .

DOC.criteria: Adult male female age 22 year old Persistent Eustachian tube dysfunction Failure medical management Positive diagnosis ETD Absence internal carotid artery ( ICA ) dehiscence Able read understand English Females pregnant lactate Anatomy require adjunctive surgical procedure Concomitant nasal sinus procedure plan day surgical procedure Concomitant ear procedure plan day surgical procedure History major surgery head neck within four ( 4 ) month prior surgery History patulous ET History fluctuate sensorineural hearing loss Active acute otitis medium Tympanic membrane perforation Tympanosclerosis Acute upper respiratory infection Temporomandibular joint disorder Cleft palate Craniofacial syndrome Cystic fibrosis Ciliary dysmotility syndrome Systemic mucosal immunodeficiency disease Intolerance medication ETD Prior intervention Eustachian tube
